string-array.name: quotesArray
string-array.item: The recycling in my house was imposed by my kids.
We were in recycling before recycling was cool.
We recycle everything in my house. I am not into any particular organizations, but I am doing my part and that makes me feel okay.
So I am going to go on and work on preserving the ozone layer, encouraging everyone to recycle.
If you are not buying recycled products, you are not really recycling.
